item.title: Help with where to put this code
item.dc:creator: @fishypoo101 fishypoo101
item.description:
@fishypoo101 wrote:

ok, let me get it real fast.
~Fishypoo[br][size=1]Posted on: April 24, 2007, 07:01:46 PM[/size][hr]if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 773 && playerRights < 2) { Poisoned = true; teleblock = true; teleportToX = 3230; teleportToY = 3407; } sorry for the wait. i had to go to the bathroom!

Read full topic

sure

item.title: Help with where to put this code
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

[quote=“fishypoo101, post:6, topic:84543”]try this [code]
public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms

if (ItemID == 773) && playerrights = 3)
{
sendMessage(“You can wear this!”);
}
else
{
deleteItem(773,getItemSlot(773),1);
sendMessage(“You can’t wear this!”);
sendMessage(“It crumbles away!”);
}[/code]
that will work unless the code you provided about the p ring has errors. post anymore! ill help!
~fishypoo

	writePlayers(); 
	if (actionAmount < 0) {
		actionAmount = 0;
	}
	if (actionTimer > 0) {
		actionTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (actionAmount > 25) {
		sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!");
		misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it");
		disconnected = true;
	}
	if (theifTimer > 0) {
		theifTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (AgilityTimer > 0) {
		AgilityTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (WCTimer > 0) {
		WCTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (RCTimer > 0) {[/quote]

100 errors while compiling, can you fix the code if it has errors, you said you have the SAME ONE i your server it probably doesn’t take that much to look for errors in a code that small

Read full topic

item.title: Help with where to put this code
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

fishypoo101:

hmmm i have that same coding in my server. can you post the entire section of that coding? it will help me a lot on how to fix. try adding it right after the 500ms and not hitting enter.


public boolean newAnimRequired = false;
public int newAnimDelay = 0;
public int newAnim = 0;

public int mageTimer = 0;
	public boolean process() {		// is being called regularily every 500ms
		writePlayers(); 
		if (actionAmount < 0) {
			actionAmount = 0;
		}
		if (actionTimer > 0) {
			actionTimer -= 1;
		}
		if (actionAmount > 25) {
			sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!");
			misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it");
			disconnected = true;
		}
		if (theifTimer > 0) {
			theifTimer -= 1;
		}
		if (AgilityTimer > 0) {
			AgilityTimer -= 1;
		}
		if (WCTimer > 0) {
			WCTimer -= 1;
		}
		if (RCTimer > 0) {

that’s that whole area.

Maybe there’s an error in my code, could you check it for me, that or just edit the above for how it should be.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with where to put this code
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo_G Nintendo_G
item.description:
@Nintendo_G wrote:

I have this code that I’m trying to add but I need to put it so it will work, here it is:

if (ItemID == 773) && playerrights = 3)
{
sendMessage("You can wear this!");
}
else
{
deleteItem(773,getItemSlot(773),1);
sendMessage("You can't wear this!");
sendMessage("It crumbles away!");
}

I think it’s under one of the public bollean proocess thingies but I can’t figure out which one, if anybody knows could you help, thanks.

Read full topic
